author: rajith
msg: Added the -DuseQueue option to switch between pub/sub and p2p.
If useQueue is present then we use p2p.

author: rajith
msg: Now the Broker module does not compile as it seem to depend on an obselete package.
So I haev commented the broker module in the build. We can move the broker code to work with the new MINA version during the f2f.
